entry.content:
GeoSPARQL Standards Working Group Meeting Minutes

Meeting Details

Meeting Date: 05/29/2024

Meeting Time: 2000 UTC

Meeting Location: GoToMeeting

Attendees

Attendee Moniker
Matthew Perry MP
Timo Homburg TH
Nicholas Car NC
Paul Cripps PC
Jo Abhayaratna JA

Note Takers

  • MP

Action Items From Last Meetings

| Done? | Item | Responsible | Due Date | | —- | —- | —- | — |

Discussion Items

Time Item Who Notes
2033 General discussion of current status All
  • TH: Discussion of GeoLD Workshop at ESWC 2024
  • NC: Discussion of need for 3D GeoSPARQL use cases
2033 Open Issues All
  • [#523](https://github.com/opengeospatial/ogc-geosparql/issues/523) Create a GH Issues template for 3D Use Cases
    • JA: Would be good to get interested parties to attend one of our meetings
  • [#513](https://github.com/opengeospatial/ogc-geosparql/issues/513) SHACL links broken
    • NC: these broken link issues will not be fixed unil OGC overhauls infrastructure
  • [#511](https://github.com/opengeospatial/ogc-geosparql/issues/511) 1.1: revise alignments
    • JA: Still working on this new document - new computer issues
2105     MEETING ENDS

Action Items

# Item Responsible Due Date
1 Create initial use case template with first use case example. #523 NC Next Meeting

entry.title: GeoSPARQL Standards Working Group Meeting Minutes 2024/01/10

link.title: GeoSPARQL Standards Working Group Meeting Minutes 2024/01/10

entry.content:
GeoSPARQL Standards Working Group Meeting Minutes

Meeting Details

Meeting Date: 10/01/2024

Meeting Time: 2000 UTC

Meeting Location: GoToMeeting

Attendees

Attendee Moniker
Matthew Perry MP
Timo Homburg TH
Nicholas Car NC

Note Takers

  • JA

Action Items From Last Meetings

| Done? | Item | Responsible | Due Date | | —- | —- | —- | — |

Discussion Items

Time Item Who Notes
2014 Intro JA Call for Patents
  • None known
Roll Call
  • Attendees recorded in minutes
  • Attendees confirmed vocally
2015 Run through actions All
  • TH: Fix [#463](https://github.com/opengeospatial/ogc-geosparql/issues/463)
    • TH: PR 470 ready for review
    • NC: Thought he already fixed it
    • [fixed] Merged PR [#470](https://github.com/opengeospatial/ogc-geosparql/issues/470)
  • TH: Complete work on GeoSPARQL 1.1 Function URIs do not resolve in vocprez · Issue [#264](https://github.com/opengeospatial/NamingAuthority/issues/264)
    • Unresolved issue with namespaces: Need one for parameters, Need one for outputs
    • PR [#469](https://github.com/opengeospatial/ogc-geosparql/pull/469)
      • TH: Will add a namespace for parameters and add a namespace for outputs
      • PREFIX geofo:
    • NC: a bit too much RDF if everything is a vocabulary (required for vocprez rendering).
    • Good to define everything in the data but we don’t necessarily need to render everything.
    • Tell Gobe to only render functions vocab - don’t worry about sub elements.
  • NC: Respond to [#451](https://github.com/opengeospatial/ogc-geosparql/issues/451): Closed
  • JA: Chat to NC about [#249](https://github.com/opengeospatial/ogc-geosparql/issues/249)
    • NC: They should show us what JSON serialization they want so that we can evaluate it. They want a pure RDF serialization without a microformat for geometry
    • NC to respond to the issue.
  • Misc topics:
    • NC: Continuous Integration is building static vocabs and OGC NA is also rendering them - we should let OGC NA render them instead of us.
      • NC will create a diagram and OGC NA will render artifacts
      • OGC NA wants confirmation that they have rendered all the things
      • TH: would still be good to render development versions of vocabs.
    • NC: Could have published 1.1 spec document but all the other assets are preventing the release. Much longer checklist for release now.
    • NC: Issue [#430](https://github.com/opengeospatial/ogc-geosparql/issues/430): Consider qualified geometries
      • Should GeoSPARQL introduce the properties for qualification?
      • TH: issue was that the proposal was too general
      • NC: thinks it’s not general enough

Run through PRs All
  • Run through PRs:
    • [#466](https://github.com/opengeospatial/ogc-geosparql/pull/466) TH to fix small errors from review
    • [#469](https://github.com/opengeospatial/ogc-geosparql/pull/469)
      • TH to add outputs namespace
      • Do we need to update SHACL?
      • Waiting for Paul to take a look
    • [#488](https://github.com/opengeospatial/ogc-geosparql/pull/488), [#489](https://github.com/opengeospatial/ogc-geosparql/pull/489), [#485](https://github.com/opengeospatial/ogc-geosparql/pull/485), [#487](https://github.com/opengeospatial/ogc-geosparql/pull/487): Example links wrong in ontology file (wrong annex), [#486](https://github.com/opengeospatial/ogc-geosparql/pull/486): Consistent capitalization

Run through issues All
  • [#494](https://github.com/opengeospatial/ogc-geosparql/issues/494) Should use wording suggestion in issue
  • [#492](https://github.com/opengeospatial/ogc-geosparql/issues/492) Some typos
  • [#490](https://github.com/opengeospatial/ogc-geosparql/issues/490) Need to make suggested corrections
  • [#474](https://github.com/opengeospatial/ogc-geosparql/issues/474)NC: disagree that we should use turtle prefixes instead of SPARQL style.
2134     MEETING ENDS

Action Items

# Item Responsible Due Date
1 Investigate reduced rendering of vocabs, etc. now that OGC-NA is doing it. NC Next Meeting
2 Respond to Issue #430 and write up ways to qualify a geometry, then we can see if proposed schemes cover them NC Next Meeting
3 Ask Scott about remaining items for publishing NC Next Meeting
entry.summary: GeoSPARQL Standards Working Group Meeting Minutes Meeting Details Meeting Date: 10/01/2024

entry.content:
GeoSPARQL Standards Working Group Meeting Minutes

Meeting Details

Meeting Date: 13/12/2023

Meeting Time: 2000 UTC

Meeting Location: GoToMeeting

Attendees

Attendee Moniker
Matthew Perry MP
Timo Homburg TH
Joseph Abhayaratna JA
Nicholas Car NC
Paul Cripps PC

Note Takers

  • JA

Action Items From Last Meetings

| Done? | Item | Responsible | Due Date | | —- | —- | —- | —- |

Discussion Items

Time Item Who Notes
2006 Intro JA Call for Patents
  • None known
Roll Call
  • Attendees recorded in minutes
  • Attendees confirmed vocally
2007 Run through actions All
  • TH: Working through GeoSPARQL 1.1 Function URIs do not resolve in vocprez · Issue #264 · opengeospatial/NamingAuthority (github.com). Looking to use a parameter register to register parameters rather than the functions register. This is using https://fno.io.
  • JA: Contacted Thomas Kolbe and David Graham to ask how best to get feedback from them to represent the community.
  • TH: Pull request Geocode Literal proposal by situx · Pull Request [#466](https://github.com/opengeospatial/ogc-geosparql/pull/466) · opengeospatial/ogc-geosparql (github.com) created to address [#428](https://github.com/opengeospatial/ogc-geosparql/issues/428) and [#444](https://github.com/opengeospatial/ogc-geosparql/issues/444)

Run through PRs All #466

Run through issues All #249
2050   All Next meeting January 10 UTC2000
2052     MEETING ENDS

Action Items

# Item Responsible Due Date
1 Fix #463 TH Next Meeting
2 Complete work on #264 TH Next Meeting
3 Respond to #451 NC Next Meeting
4 Chat to NC about #249 JA Next Meeting

entry.title: GeoSPARQL Standards Working Group Meeting Minutes 2023/11/29

link.title: GeoSPARQL Standards Working Group Meeting Minutes 2023/11/29

entry.content:
GeoSPARQL Standards Working Group Meeting Minutes

Meeting Details

Meeting Date: 29/11/2023

Meeting Time: 2000 UTC

Meeting Location: GoToMeeting

Attendees

Attendee Moniker
Matthew Perry MP
Timo Homburg TH
Joseph Abhayaratna JA
Nicholas Car NC
Paul Cripps PC

Note Takers

  • JA

Action Items From Last Meetings

Done? Item Responsible Due Date
y Making corrections based on the link checker to the metanorma document. TH Next Meeting
? Check in with Scott and see where GeoSPARQL is in the publication process, and how a bug relating to Area (returns an RDF resource bu​​t should be an xsd:double). We’re also making corrections based on the link checker. Which version of the document will be published? (In Progress) JA Next Meeting
? Question for OGC: If we were to define an extension or outputs other than just GeoSPARQL, where would we put it? NC Next Meeting
y Run a link checker over the ogc geosparql repository NC Next Meeting

Discussion Items

Time Item Who Notes
2007 Intro JA Call for Patents
  • None known
Roll Call
  • Attendees recorded in minutes
  • Attendees confirmed vocally
2007 Run through actions All
  • JA: Where are we with EWKB? EWKB can be standardised but must be standardised as is.
  • NC: Where are we with URI allocation? Numerous issues raised within the NamingAuthority GitHub repo that need to be addressed before URI will be allocated.

Coordination All <ul><li>#462 Approved</li><li>#461 Nick to complete and push to branch.</li></ul>

Run through issues All #444
2102     MEETING ENDS

Action Items

# Item Responsible Due Date
1 Fix #454, #455, and #463 NC Next Meeting
2 #264 of OGC Naming Authority Git Hub Repository - URIs do not resolve and things need to be fixed in the turtle file. This has been corrected by pull request #461 TH Next Meeting
3 Respond to #451 NC Next Meeting
4 Reach out to 3DIM members to see if we can get them to join our group. #443 , #429 JA Next Meeting
5 Looking at creating a pull request to address #444 and #428. JA Next Meeting
entry.summary: GeoSPARQL Standards Working Group Meeting Minutes Meeting Details Meeting Date: 29/11/2023

entry.content:
GeoSPARQL Standards Working Group Meeting Minutes

Meeting Details

Meeting Date: 01/11/2023

Meeting Time: 2000 UTC

Meeting Location: GoToMeeting

Attendees

Attendee Moniker
Matthew Perry MP
Timo Homburg TH
Joseph Abhayaratna JA

Note Takers

  • JA

Action Items From Last Meetings

Done? Item Responsible Due Date
y Chat to Scott about membership TH Next Meeting
y Reach out to 3DIM DWG Chairs to see if we can get some of their members to join our next meeting or arrange a special joint meeting. #443, #429 JA Next Meeting
y Run a link checker over the ogc geosparql repository NC Next Meeting
in progress Run a link checker over the metanorma repository TH Next Meeting
? Question for OGC: If we were to define an extension or outputs other than just GeoSPARQL, where would we put it? NC Next Meeting
y Write up options in #444 and expose to PC’s geohash interest group TH/PC Next Meeting

Discussion Items

Time Item Who Notes
2007 Intro JA Quorum not reached
2007 Run through actions All  

Run through issues All #447 Bug in geof:area function

Coordination All
  • Timo attended the IIIF 3D working group where they’re talking about rendering 3D in the web browser. At the moment the only overlap is the speech bubble, where WKT is being used to define the speech bubble. https://github.com/IIIF/3d
  • Potential for presentation at the Geo-LD conference, if it occurs. https://i3mainz.github.io/GeoLD2022/
2043     MEETING ENDS

Action Items

# Item Responsible Due Date
1 Making corrections based on the link checker to the metanorma document. TH Next Meeting
2 Check in with Scott and see where GeoSPARQL is in the publication process, and how a bug relating to Area (returns an RDF resource bu​​t should be an xsd:double). We’re also making corrections based on the link checker. Which version of the document will be published? (In Progress) JA Next Meeting
3 Question for OGC: If we were to define an extension or outputs other than just GeoSPARQL, where would we put it? NC Next Meeting
4 Run a link checker over the ogc geosparql repository NC Next Meeting

GeoSPARQL Standards Working Group Meeting Minutes

Meeting Details

Meeting Date: 18/10/2023

Meeting Time: 2000 UTC

Meeting Location: GoToMeeting

Attendees

Attendee Moniker
Matthew Perry MP
Timo Homburg TH
Joseph Abhayaratna JA
Nicholas Car NC
Paul Cripps PC

Note Takers

  • JA

Action Items From Last Meetings

Done? Item Responsible Due Date
n Chat to Scott about membership TH Next Meeting
y Nudge OGC staff to reflect new Chairs JA Next Meeting
y Report to OGC that the URL rewriter is adding an extra def as per the note. JA Next Meeting
y Check with Scott, what does the OGC recommend we do with different translations? Does the name server support different languages? JA Next Meeting
y Bring Scott’s attention to #429. Looks like it would be good to get Scott and OGC’s 3D brains trust to join the next meeting to discuss what they’d like to see in the Linked Data representation of OGC 3D “stuff”. JA Next Meeting

Discussion Items

Time Item Who Notes
2007 Intro JA Call for Patents
  • None known
Roll Call
  • Attendees recorded in minutes
  • Attendees confirmed vocally
2007 Run through actions All  

Run through pull requests All #443 Draft for inclusion of surface textures and materials
  • Looks like a good candidate for modular extension
  • Question for OGC: If we were to define an extension, where would we put it?

Run through issues All #444 Geocoding Support in GeoSPARQL
2102     MEETING ENDS

Action Items

# Item Responsible Due Date
1 Chat to Scott about membership TH Next Meeting
2 Reach out to 3DIM DWG Chairs to see if we can get some of their members to join our next meeting or arrange a special joint meeting. #443, #429 JA Next Meeting
3 Run a link checker over the ogc geosparql repository NC Next Meeting
4 Run a link checker over the metanorma repository TH Next Meeting
5 Question for OGC: If we were to define an extension or outputs other than just GeoSPARQL, where would we put it? NC Next Meeting
6 Write up options in #444 and expose to PC’s geohash interest group TH/PC Next Meeting

entry.title: GeoSPARQL Standards Working Group Meeting Minutes 2023/09/20

link.title: GeoSPARQL Standards Working Group Meeting Minutes 2023/09/20

entry.content:
GeoSPARQL Standards Working Group Meeting Minutes

Meeting Details

Meeting Date: 20/09/2023

Meeting Time: 2000 UTC

Meeting Location: GoToMeeting

Attendees

Attendee Moniker
Matthew Perry MP
Timo Homburg TH
Joseph Abhayaratna JA
Linda van den Brink LV

Note Takers

  • JA

Action Items From Last Meetings

Done? Item Responsible Due Date
y Get metanorma repository in a state to be reviewed by OGC TH Next Meeting
y Organise review of ISO repository by OGC staff JA Next Meeting

Discussion Items

Time Item Who Notes
2005 Intro JA Call for Patents
  • None known
Roll Call
  • Attendees recorded in minutes
  • Attendees confirmed vocally
2007 Run through actions All  

Run through pull requests All
  • [#292](https://github.com/opengeospatial/ogc-geosparql/pull/292)
    • Not sure if we need another French language review
    • We have 1 review so far - we need 2 before we can merge the PR
    • LVB to get back to second reviewer to notify of need to review
  • TH - not sure how language translations affect OGC NA URIs - do we show a single language or multiple in the HTML renderings?
  • OGC-based CRS URIs seem to be missing (404 not found):
    • For example, http://www.opengis.net/def/crs/OGC/1.3/CRS84
    • Redirects to https://crs.rasdaman.com/defdef/crs/OGC/1.3/CRS84 -> should be https://crs.rasdaman.com/def/crs/OGC/1.3/CRS84
2041     MEETING ENDS

Action Items

# Item Responsible Due Date
1 Chat to Scott about membership TH Next Meeting
2 Nudge OGC staff to reflect new Chairs JA Next Meeting
3 Report to OGC that the URL rewriter is adding an extra def as per the note. JA Next Meeting
4 Check with Scott, what does the OGC recommend we do with different translations? Does the name server support different languages? JA Next Meeting
5 Bring Scott’s attention to #429. Looks like it would be good to get Scott and OGC’s 3D brains trust to join the next meeting to discuss what they’d like to see in the Linked Data representation of OGC 3D “stuff”. JA Next Meeting
entry.summary: GeoSPARQL Standards Working Group Meeting Minutes Meeting Details Meeting Date: 20/09/2023

entry.title: GeoSPARQL Standards Working Group Meeting Minutes 2023/09/06

link.title: GeoSPARQL Standards Working Group Meeting Minutes 2023/09/06

entry.content:
GeoSPARQL Standards Working Group Meeting Minutes

Meeting Details

Meeting Date: 06/09/2023

Meeting Time: 2000 UTC

Meeting Location: GoToMeeting

Attendees

Attendee Moniker
Matthew Perry MP
Timo Homburg TH
Nicholas Car NC
Joseph Abhayaratna JA

Note Takers

  • MP

Action Items From Last Meetings

| Done? | Item | Responsible | Due Date | | —- | —- | —- | — |

Discussion Items

Time Item Who Notes
2005 Intro MP Call for Patents
  • None known
Roll Call
  • Attendees recorded in minutes
  • Attendees confirmed vocally
2007 Run through actions All None

ISO Publication Questions All
  • What should be in editors and what should be in Contributors?
  • Does the license need to be there, or is it replaced by ISO’s license?
  • Terms and definitions section appears twice, we couldn’t work out how to remove it.
  • The Normative Reference section looks very different to the Bibliography, have we done something wrong in the Normative Reference section - it doesn’t look as nicely rendered as the other sections.
  • Does the document more or less look like what you’d expect? If not, what should change.
  • Repository location: https://github.com/situx/mn-samples-ogc
  • Latest build artefacts: https://github.com/situx/mn-samples-ogc/actions/runs/6025922660
2041     MEETING ENDS

Action Items

# Item Responsible Due Date
1 Get metanorma repository in a state to be reviewed by OGC TH Next Meeting
2 Organise review of ISO repository by OGC staff JA Next Meeting

entry.title: GeoSPARQL Standards Working Group Meeting Minutes 2023/08/23

link.title: GeoSPARQL Standards Working Group Meeting Minutes 2023/08/23

entry.content:
GeoSPARQL Standards Working Group Meeting Minutes

Meeting Details

Meeting Date: 23/08/2023

Meeting Time: 2000 UTC

Meeting Location: GoToMeeting

Attendees

Attendee Moniker
Matthew Perry MP
Timo Homburg TH
Nicholas Car NC
Joseph Abhayaratna JA

Note Takers

  • MP

Action Items From Last Meetings

| Done? | Item | Responsible | Due Date | | —- | —- | —- | — |

Discussion Items

Time Item Who Notes
2012 Intro MP Call for Patents
  • None known
Roll Call
  • Attendees recorded in minutes
  • Attendees confirmed vocally
2015 Run through actions All NC - Issue #433 - working on fixing hyperlinks

ISO Publication Discussion All
  • TH - Fixed ISO doc links: Jo needs to meet with Scott about pending issues
  • TH - Annex A4 for DGGS
  • NC - need to fix DGGS Annex sections in original GeoSPARQL 1.1 doc too [#436](https://github.com/opengeospatial/ogc-geosparql/issues/436)
  • NC - we can close metanorma format ticket [#425](https://github.com/opengeospatial/ogc-geosparql/issues/425)
  • JA - OGC allows maintaining document in metanorma format
    • We should merge the 1.1 spec into the master document and then maintain it in metanorma format
    • OGC can pull their document out of metanorma
    • Once we are happy with a 1.1 metanorma document, we can give the branch to OGC team to do final modifications and change requests for ISO

Spatial Ontology All
  • JA - OGC has a desire to support spatial ontology work. Scott thinks GeoSPARQL group would be the group to do the ontology work - with collaboration with GeoSemantics DWG
  • TH & NC - We are committed to 1.3 and doing it, but spatial ontology is a larger work that needs more discussion.
  • JA - Pieces of the ontology will probably emerge from 1.3 work

Chairs All JA - Scott to make updates for new chairs

Meeting notes All JA will push the meeting notes to GIT as markdown doc

EWKB All
  • MP - is it an issue if EWKB is not defined in another OGC spec
  • NC - we may have to do a brief definition of it similar to what we did with DGGS Literal
  • JA - it may be a problem - we could ask them to support it as a community standard
  • TH - we also encourage the use of SRID URI instead of encoded SRID in binary

Qualified Geometries All
  • [#418](https://github.com/opengeospatial/ogc-geosparql/pull/418) - discussed how this interacts with qualified features. Specific example being proposed buildings and their different geometries and the need to use a different style for fuzzy geometries in EU/Germany. Discussion with NC required
  • Issues for consideration: Confirming scope, Spatial Ontology
2121     MEETING ENDS

Action Items

| # | Item | Responsible | Due Date | | —- | —- | —- | —- |
entry.summary: GeoSPARQL Standards Working Group Meeting Minutes Meeting Details Meeting Date: 23/08/2023

entry.title: GeoSPARQL Standards Working Group Meeting Minutes 2023/08/09

link.title: GeoSPARQL Standards Working Group Meeting Minutes 2023/08/09

entry.content:
GeoSPARQL Standards Working Group Meeting Minutes

Meeting Details

Meeting Date: 09/08/2023

Meeting Time: 2000 UTC

Meeting Location: GoToMeeting

Attendees

Attendee Moniker
Joseph Abhayaratna JA
Matthew Perry MP
Timo Homburg TH
Linda van den Brink LV

Note Takers

  • JA

Action Items From Last Meetings

Done? Item Responsible Due Date
n JA to discuss Mainz University membership and chairpersonship with TH and Scott Simmons - Only till August JA Next Meeting
y JA to kick off vote on chairs JA Next Meeting

Discussion Items

Time Item Who Notes
2005 Intro JA Call for Patents
  • None known
Roll Call
  • Attendees recorded in minutes
  • Attendees confirmed vocally
2007 Run through actions All No progress
2017 Run through PRs and issues All
  • [#418](https://github.com/opengeospatial/ogc-geosparql/pull/418) - discussed how this interacts with qualified features. Specific example being proposed buildings and their different geometries and the need to use a different style for fuzzy geometries in EU/Germany. Discussion with NC required
  • Issues for consideration: Confirming scope, Spatial Ontology
2045 CRS as ProjJSON-LD All
  • Looking at whether CRS can be represented using Projection JSON. We would then define a JSON-LD context for it. This would require an OGC namespace, but we’ll need to consider who would sponsor the request through OGC-NA.
  • TH - Can we make corrections in the spec since it’s already approved or is it too late? We need to check with Scott. ISO version could potentially have some fixes.
2100     MEETING ENDS

Action Items

# Item Responsible Due Date
1 Jo to confirm whether OGC has interest/appetite for developing a Spatial Ontology or having it be part of GeoSPARQL. JA Next Meeting
2 Jo to reach out to Martin Disresseaux about Projection JSON. JA Next Meeting
entry.summary: GeoSPARQL Standards Working Group Meeting Minutes Meeting Details Meeting Date: 09/08/2023
